hero.title: Administrative system for schools
hero.description: Program designed in Spanish and English with a sophisticated security system for access control. This administrative system facilitates administrative tasks, increasing efficiency and providing more time to focus on the supervision phase of educational processes.

items.title: Implementation Service
items.description: This includes coordination for training stages with implementation dates. Material (manuals, etc.) for staff training. Follow-up to ensure the tasks required to complete the implementation of the SchoolSoft system are carried out for the benefit of the institution.

items.title: Regiweb
items.description: The new all-internet service, complete teacher registration, parents can view their children's grades, manage all accounts, and much more.

items.title: Technical Support
items.description: Individual technical assistance for administrative and teaching staff, by phone, internet, or remote control. All these technical support access options are available according to the needs and facilities available at the institution.

items.title: Repair Service
items.description: Parts and service for school equipment installed by our company.

items.title: Laboratory Rental
items.description: Offer your students a modern lab with all applications such as Office 2018, class control, educational programs, antivirus, Windows 10, Windows Server 2018, among other options. Call us, and we will improve any written offer.

items.title: Sale of Computers and all types of accessories.
Student Information
items.description: Student record, father, mother, guardian, teachers, vaccines, diseases, disabilities, re-enrollment, homeroom, data control, indexes, record search, socio-economic, medical, totals by grade, account list, address report, phone list, work list, parent list, new student report, discount list, labels, certified letter, and a variety of reports.

items.title: Grading System
items.description: Course catalog, subjects, special programs, entry of grades and behavior by trimester, teacher's log, calculate trimester and semester grades, merits, demerits, failures, honor roll, ranges, trimester averages, summer grades, report cards, comment screen for the report card, messages for the report card, class schedule, grade distribution, grade log, cumulative and a variety of reports.

items.title: Electronic Record
items.description: Entry of daily work grades, projects, notebook work, exams, trimester behavior, trimester, semester, and final averages, trimester attendance, daily plans, and a variety of reports.

items.title: Accounts Receivable
items.description: Budget, costs, discounts, payment screen, surcharges, payment booklet, list of debtors, account statement, daily payments, generates different collection letters, 30-60-90 info, receipt, and a variety of reports.

items.title: Church System
items.description: Marriage, Baptism, Communion, Denial, Confirmation, and Notification certificates, etc.

items.title: Regiweb
items.description: Includes grade entry; the teacher can enter different types of grades, such as exams, quizzes, daily work, notebook assignments, attendance, behavior, and send homework. The teacher can communicate with parents through the web, mobile, or email. Various reports can be printed.

items.title: Parent Module
items.description: Parents can view their children's grades, communicate with teachers via web or email, update their information, enable or disable email notifications, and request appointments with teachers.

items.title: Administration
items.description: The school can manage modules, general school information, control start and end dates of trimesters, import and export data, activate and deactivate users, send messages through the web, mobile, or email, and generate various reports.

items.title: Event Calendar
items.description: Allows adding different activities throughout the year. Anyone can view the calendar, but only the administrator or designated person can add, modify, or delete events. These modules include maintenance for updates and changes suggested by the institution.
